class.name: MixtureMultivariateRealDistribution

javadoc.text: Class for representing * mixture model distributions.
Normalized weight of each mixture component.
Creates a mixture model from a list of distributions and their * associated weights.
javadoc.param: components List of (weight, distribution) pairs from which to sample.

javadoc.text: Creates a mixture model from a list of distributions and their * associated weights.
javadoc.param: components Distributions from which to sample.
javadoc.throws: NotPositiveException if any of the weights is negative.
DimensionMismatchException if not all components have the same * number of variables.
